name: Illuminate
description:
The following prototype has been posted online for presentation purposes only and has only been slightly updated.

It is no longer in active development.

Take charge of the Illuminator and Mirror Busters and save your friends from the Dark Planet Nyx!

illuminate! is a 2D top-down curtain fire shooter game that implements reflection mechanics to defeat enemies.

  • Credits:

    • Producer / Character Sprite Artist - Hans Antonio
    • Character Designer / UI Programmer - Rogi Shin
    • Game Programmer / UI Designer - Ken Santos
    • Sound Design - Ken Lin
    • Background Artist - Tine Crispino
    • Quality Assurance - JM Vitug
    • Quality Assurance - Kim Fines
